long_description: Built with soft, moisture-wicking fabric, a ventilating zipper and a warm hood, the REI Sport hoodie for women keeps you swiftly moving towards your fitness goals during runs in chilly weather. Extremely soft polyester and spandex comfortably moves with you during active pursuits and wicks moisture away from skin so you won't feel chilled when working up a sweat. Rear mesh inset enhances ventilation. Close-fitting hood stays put while running; short zipper makes it easy to put on hoodie or enhance ventilation. Thumbholes help keep sleeves in place while running and work seamlessly with gloves to keep wrists warm. Reflective detailing increases visibility in low light. Fabric provides UPF 35 sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. REI Sport hoodie for women offers a next-to-body, athletic fit. Special buy.
